sentences.english: The Yichun Luming molybdenum ore is a big porphyry deposits.
sentences.chinese: 伊春鹿鳴鉬礦爲大型斑岩型礦牀。

sentences.english: My crown, my porphyry-basined waters cool.
sentences.chinese: 我的王冠，我的斑岩底盆水涼爽。

sentences.english: The evolution las of alkali rich porphyry is correlated with those of other 4 magmatic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 對富鹼斑岩和其它4類岩漿岩進行了演化規律的對比。

sentences.english: The porphyry mass provided not only mineralizing hydrothermal solution but also a part of mineral matter.
sentences.chinese: 斑岩體不僅提供成礦熱液，也提供部分礦質。

sentences.english: The Dexing copper mine in Jiangxi Province is a porphyry copper ore field of veinlet-disseminated type.
sentences.chinese: 江西德興銅礦是一個細脈浸染型斑岩銅礦田。

sentences.english: Granite-porphyry stock is ore-forming parent rock.
sentences.chinese: 成礦主要與燕山期花崗斑岩體有關。

sentences.english: Dexing Copper Mine is an especially large porphyry copper mine in the world.
sentences.chinese: 德興銅礦是世界級特大型斑岩銅礦。

sentences.english: The ore bodies in the Gongpoquan deposit are mainly hosted within granodiorite porphyry and dacite porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 礦體主要產在花崗閃長斑岩和英安斑岩體內。

sentences.english: The ore bodies in the Gongpoquan deposit are mainly hosted within granodiorite porphyry and dacite porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 礦體主要產在花崗閃長斑岩和英安斑岩體內。

sentences.english: Wenquan molybdenum deposit is a porphyry type mineral deposit related with Indosinian granite.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉鉬礦是與印支期花崗岩有關的斑岩型鉬礦牀。

sentences.english: The Hengjian deposit is a porphyry uranium deposit in genesis.
sentences.chinese: 橫澗礦牀是斑岩鈾礦牀。

sentences.english: Tangjiaping molybdenum is a typical porphyry type molybdenum deposit.
sentences.chinese: 湯家坪鉬礦屬典型的斑岩型鉬礦牀。

sentences.english: The porphyry gold deposits and epithermal gold deposits were formed in an arc compressional environment.
sentences.chinese: 斑岩型和淺成低溫熱液型金礦牀形成於島弧擠壓環境。

sentences.english: It is expected that there exists good ore-forming potential in silicified and chloritized zones in lower part of this porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 預測斑岩體下部硅化絹雲母化帶具有較好的成礦前景。

sentences.english: There are many similarities between Yuerya and Niuxinshan independent porphyry deposits.
sentences.chinese: 峪耳崖和牛心山獨立斑岩型金礦有諸多相似之處。

sentences.english: Wallrock alteration has character of porphyritic profile metallogenetic model in the spatial distribution.
sentences.chinese: 圍巖蝕變的空間分佈具有斑岩型單側成礦模式特徵。
